sub_fields.label: Header Section
sub_fields.name: header_section

sub_fields.label: Tag Line
sub_fields.name: tag_line
sub_fields.instructions: This Fields data will be set to the Header section of each tour page.

sub_fields.label: Tour Description
sub_fields.name: tour_description
sub_fields.instructions: The description below the tour name of the header section.  Wrap with strong HTML tag to break the line

sub_fields.label: Itineraries
sub_fields.name: itineraries
sub_fields.instructions: This is to manually add all the Itineraries of  the Tour.
